channel.title: detached on Let's see what happens.
channel.description: Recent content in detached on Let's see what happens.

item.title: Special Operation
item.description: Heat On one hand the topic is heated so it is not advised for polite discussion. On the other hand there is some insight to extract. Naming The scope of what is called “special operation” actually is nuclear. One can say that it is an invasion or war - expecting the worse. But also this can be something addittional to that - one move in some combination on the geopolicial landscape.
